_description: Common assistant settings for VAPI dashboard. Apply these settings to all assistants.

model._notes: gpt-4.1 as global default. Per-agent overrides apply via membersOverrides.

voice._notes: Cartesia sonic-3 for natural-sounding voice. Global default voiceId.

transcriber._notes: flux-general-en for best accuracy with American English accents.

_greeter.firstMessage: {{firm_name}}, this is {{agent_name}}. Who am I speaking with?

analysisPlan.summaryPrompt: Summarize this call in 2-3 sentences. Include: caller type, main purpose, outcome (transferred/message taken/info provided), and any follow-up needed.
analysisPlan.structuredDataPrompt: Extract: caller_name, caller_type, client_name (if different), purpose, outcome, priority_level
analysisPlan.successEvaluationPrompt: Evaluate if the call was handled successfully. Consider: Was the caller routed correctly? Was their need addressed? Were they treated professionally?

_hipaa_note: Enable if handling PHI. May affect transcription accuracy.
_response_delay_note: Small delay feels more natural than instant responses.
_interrupt_note: Allow callers to interrupt with just 2 words for natural conversation.

variableValues._description: Default variable values. Override these per-firm in production.

agent_specific_overrides._description: Agent-specific setting overrides. These are applied via squad membersOverrides in production.

greeter_classifier._note: Greeter has custom voice (different voiceId) and uses chatgpt-4o-latest

insurance_adjuster._note: Uses chatgpt-4o-latest for insurance adjuster interactions

medical_provider._note: Uses chatgpt-4o-latest for medical provider interactions

spanish_speaker._note: Uses chatgpt-4o-latest. Very brief - just acknowledgment and transfer

new_client._note: Slightly warmer for empathetic responses to accident victims

sales_solicitation._note: Keep very brief - just taking message and ending call
